order_text_receipt: Receipt/ใบเสร็จรับเงิน
order_text_contact: ติดต่อผู้รับ / Contact
order_text_customer_phone_in_billing_loc: Customer Phone Number in Billing Location:
order_help_country_match: Whether country of IP address matches billing address country (mismatch = higher risk).
order_help_country_code: Country Code of the IP address.
order_help_high_risk_country: Whether IP address or billing address country is in Ghana, Nigeria, or Vietnam.
order_help_distance: Distance from IP address to Billing Location in kilometers (large distance = higher risk).
order_help_ip_region: Estimated State/Region of the IP address.
order_help_ip_city: Estimated City of the IP address.
order_help_ip_latitude: Estimated Latitude of the IP address.
order_help_ip_longitude: Estimated Longitude of the IP address.
order_help_ip_asnum: Estimated Autonomous System Number of the IP address.
order_help_ip_user_type: Estimated user type of the IP address.
order_help_ip_country_confidence: Representing our confidence that the country location is correct.
order_help_ip_region_confidence: Representing our confidence that the region location is correct.
order_help_ip_city_confidence: Representing our confidence that the city location is correct.
order_help_ip_postal_confidence: Representing our confidence that the postal code location is correct.
order_help_ip_postal_code: Estimated Postal Code of the IP address.
order_help_ip_accuracy_radius: The average distance between the actual location of the end user using the IP address and the location returned by the GeoIP City database, in miles.
order_help_ip_net_speed_cell: Estimated network type of the IP address.
order_help_ip_metro_code: Estimated Metro Code of the IP address.
order_help_ip_area_code: Estimated Area Code of the IP address.
order_help_ip_time_zone: Estimated Time Zone of the IP address.
order_help_ip_region_name: Estimated Region name of the IP address.
order_help_ip_domain: Estimated domain of the IP address.
order_help_ip_country_name: Estimated Country name of the IP address.
order_help_ip_continent_code: Estimated Continent code of the IP address.
order_help_ip_corporate_proxy: Whether the IP is an Corporate Proxy in the database or not.
order_help_anonymous_proxy: Whether IP address is Anonymous Proxy (anonymous proxy = very high risk).
order_help_proxy_score: Likelihood of IP Address being an Open Proxy.
order_help_is_trans_proxy: Whether IP address is in our database of known transparent proxy servers, returned if forwardedIP is passed as an input.
order_help_free_mail: Whether e-mail is from free e-mail provider (free e-mail = higher risk).
order_help_carder_email: Whether e-mail is in database of high risk e-mails.
order_help_high_risk_username: Whether usernameMD5 input is in database of high risk usernames. Only returned if usernameMD5 is included in inputs.
order_help_high_risk_password: Whether passwordMD5 input is in database of high risk passwords. Only returned if passwordMD5 is included in inputs.
order_help_bin_match: Whether country of issuing bank based on BIN number matches billing address country.
order_help_bin_country: Country Code of the bank which issued the credit card based on BIN number.
order_help_bin_name_match: Whether name of issuing bank matches inputted  BIN name. A return value of Yes provides a positive indication that cardholder is in possession of credit card.
order_help_bin_name: Name of the bank which issued the credit card based on BIN number. Available for approximately 96% of BIN numbers.
order_help_bin_phone_match: Whether customer service phone number matches inputed BIN Phone. A return value of Yes provides a positive indication that cardholder is in possession of credit card.
order_help_bin_phone: Customer service phone number listed on back of credit card. Available for approximately 75% of BIN numbers. In some cases phone number returned may be outdated.
order_help_customer_phone_in_billing_loc: Whether the customer phone number is in the billing zip code. A return value of Yes provides a positive indication that the phone number listed belongs to the cardholder. A return value of No indicates that the phone number may be in a different area, or may not be listed in our database. NotFound is returned when the phone number prefix cannot be found in our database at all. Currently we only support US Phone numbers.
order_help_ship_forward: Whether shipping address is in database of known mail drops.
order_help_city_postal_match: Whether billing city and state match zipcode. Currently available for US addresses only, returns empty string outside the US.
order_help_ship_city_postal_match: Whether shipping city and state match zipcode. Currently available for US addresses only, returns empty string outside the US.
order_help_score: Overall fraud score based on outputs listed above. This is the original fraud score, and is based on a simple formula. It has been replaced with risk score (see below), but is kept for backwards compatibility.
order_help_explanation: A brief explanation of the score, detailing what factors contributed to it, according to our formula. Please note this corresponds to the score, not the riskScore.
order_help_risk_score: New fraud score representing the estimated probability that the order is fraud, based off of analysis of past minFraud transactions. Requires an upgrade for clients who signed up before February 2007.
order_help_queries_remaining: Number of queries remaining in your account, can be used to alert you when you may need to add more queries to your account.
order_help_maxmind_id: Unique identifier, used to reference transactions when reporting fraudulent activity back to MaxMind. This reporting will help MaxMind improve its service to you and will enable a planned feature to customize the fraud scoring formula based on your chargeback history.
order_help_error: Returns an error string with a warning message or a reason why the request failed.
order_error_warning: Warning: Please check the form carefully for errors!
order_error_permission: Warning: You do not have permission to modify orders!
order_error_action: Warning: Could not complete this action!
recurring_text_success: Success: You have modified recurring profiles!
recurring_text_cancel_confirm: Profile's cancellation cannot be undone! Are you sure want to do this?
product_returns_error_warning: Warning: Please check the form carefully for errors!
product_returns_error_permission: Warning: You do not have permission to modify returns!
product_returns_error_firstname: First Name must be between 1 and 32 characters!
product_returns_error_lastname: Last Name must be between 1 and 32 characters!
product_returns_error_email: E-Mail Address does not appear to be valid!
product_returns_error_telephone: Telephone must be between 3 and 32 characters!
product_returns_error_product: Product Name must be greater than 3 and less than 255 characters!
product_returns_error_model: Product Model must be greater than 3 and less than 64 characters!
product_returns_error_bank_account_name: Bank Account Name must be greater than 3
product_returns_error_bank_account_numbe: Bank Account Number must be greater than 3
product_returns_error_bank_account_branc: Bank Account Branch must be greater than 3
voucher_theme_text_success: Success: You have modified voucher themes!
voucher_theme_error_permission: Warning: You do not have permission to modify voucher themes!
voucher_theme_error_name: Voucher Theme Name must be between 3 and 32 characters!
voucher_theme_error_voucher: Warning: This voucher theme cannot be deleted as it is currently assigned to vouchers!
voucherstext_sent: Success: Gift Voucher e-mail has been sent!
vouchershelp_code: The code the customer enters to activate the voucher.
voucherserror_permission: Warning: You do not have permission to modify vouchers!
voucherserror_exists: Warning: Voucher code is already in use!
voucherserror_code: Code must be between 3 and 10 characters!
voucherserror_to_name: Recipient's Name must be between 1 and 64 characters!
voucherserror_from_name: Your Name must be between 1 and 64 characters!
voucherserror_email: E-Mail Address does not appear to be valid!
voucherserror_amount: Amount must be greater than or equal to 1!
voucherserror_order: Warning: This voucher cannot be deleted as it is part of an order !
settings_help_confirm_payment_email: Setting email for recieve customer comfirm payment
settings_help_return_email: Setting email for recieve customer return order
settings_help_geocode: Please enter your store location geocode manually.
settings_help_open: Fill in your store's opening times.
settings_help_comment: This field is for any special notes you would like to tell the customer i.e. Store does not accept cheques.
settings_help_location: The different store locations you have that you want displayed on the contact us form.
settings_help_currency: Change the default currency. Clear your browser cache to see the change and reset your existing cookie.
settings_help_currency_auto: Set your store to automatically update currencies daily.
settings_help_product_limit: Determines how many catalog items are shown per page (products, categories, etc).
settings_help_product_description_length: In the list view, short description character limit (categories, special etc).
settings_help_limit_admin: Determines how many admin items are shown per page (orders, customers, etc).
settings_help_product_count: Show the number of products inside the subcategories in the storefront header category menu. Be warned, this will cause an extreme performance hit for seller with a lot of subcategories!
settings_help_review: Enable/Disable new review entry and display of existing reviews.
settings_help_review_mail: Send an email to the store owner when a new review is created.
settings_help_voucher_min: Minimum amount a customer can purchase a voucher for.
settings_help_voucher_max: Maximum amount a customer can purchase a voucher for.
settings_help_tax_default: Use the store address to calculate taxes if no one is logged in. You can choose to use the store address for the customer's shipping or payment address.
settings_help_tax_customer: Use the customer's default address when they login to calculate taxes. You can choose to use the default address for the customer's shipping or payment address.
settings_help_customer_online: Track customers online via the customer reports section.
settings_help_customer_group_display: Display customer groups that new customers can select to use such as wholesale and business when signing up.
settings_help_customer_price: Only show prices when a customer is logged in.
settings_help_login_attempts: Maximum login attempts allowed before the account is locked for 1 hour. Customer and affliate accounts can be unlocked on the customer or affliate admin pages.
settings_help_account: Forces people to agree to terms before an account can be created.
settings_help_account_mail: Send an email to the store owner when a new account is registered.
settings_help_invoice_prefix: Set the invoice prefix (e.g. INV-2011-00). Invoice IDs will start at 1 for each unique prefix.
settings_help_api: Default API user the admin should use.
settings_help_cart_weight: Show the cart weight on the cart page.
settings_help_checkout_guest: Allow customers to checkout without creating an account. This will not be available when a downloadable product is in the shopping cart.
settings_help_checkout: Forces people to agree to terms before a customer can checkout.
settings_help_order_status: Set the default order status when an order is processed.
settings_help_processing_status: Set the order status the customer's order must reach before the order starts stock subtraction and coupon, voucher and rewards redemption.
settings_help_complete_status: Set the order status the customer's order must reach before they are allowed to access their downloadable products and gift vouchers.
settings_help_order_mail: Send an email to the store owner when a new order is created.
settings_help_stock_display: Display stock quantity on the product page.
settings_help_stock_warning: Display out of stock message on the shopping cart page if a product is out of stock but stock checkout is yes. (Warning always shows if stock checkout is no)
settings_help_stock_checkout: Allow customers to still checkout if the products they are ordering are not in stock.
settings_help_affiliate_approval: Automatically approve any new affiliates who sign up.
settings_help_affiliate_auto: Automatically add commission when each order reaches the complete status.
settings_help_affiliate: Forces people to agree to terms before an affiliate account can be created.
settings_help_affiliate_mail: Send an email to the store owner when a new affiliate is registered.
settings_help_return: Forces people to agree to terms before a return can be created.
settings_help_return_status: Set the default return status when a return request is submitted.
settings_help_icon: The icon should be a PNG that is 16px x 16px.
settings_help_ftp_root: The directory your OpenCart installation is stored in. Normally 'public_html/'.
settings_help_mail_protocol: Only choose 'Mail' unless your host has disabled the php mail function.
settings_help_mail_parameter: When using 'Mail', additional mail parameters can be added here (e.g. -f email@storeaddress.com).
settings_help_mail_smtp_hostname: Add 'tls://' prefix if security connection is required. (e.g. tls://smtp.gmail.com).
settings_help_mail_alert: Any additional emails you want to receive the alert email, in addition to the main store email. (comma separated).
settings_help_fraud_detection: MaxMind is a fraud detection service. If you don't have a license key you can sign up here. Once you have obtained a key, copy and paste it into the field below.
settings_help_fraud_score: The higher the score the more likely the order is fraudulent. Set a score between 0 - 100.
settings_help_fraud_status: Orders over your set score will be assigned this order status and will not be allowed to reach the complete status automatically.
settings_help_secure: To use SSL check with your host if a SSL certificate is installed and add the SSL URL to the catalog and admin config files.
settings_help_shared: Try to share the session cookie between seller so the cart can be passed between different domains.
settings_help_robots: A list of web crawler user agents that shared sessions will not be used with. Use separate lines for each user agent.
settings_help_seo_url: To use SEO URLs, apache module mod-rewrite must be installed and you need to rename the htaccess.txt to .htaccess.
settings_help_file_max_size: The maximum image file size you can upload in Image Manager. Enter as byte.
settings_help_file_ext_allowed: Add which file extensions are allowed to be uploaded. Use a new line for each value.
settings_help_file_mime_allowed: Add which file mime types are allowed to be uploaded. Use a new line for each value.
settings_help_maintenance: Prevents customers from browsing your store. They will instead see a maintenance message. If logged in as admin, you will see the store as normal.
settings_help_password: Allow forgotten password to be used for the admin. This will be disabled automatically if the system detects a hack attempt.
settings_help_encryption: Please provide a secret key that will be used to encrypt private information when processing orders.
settings_help_compression: GZIP for more efficient transfer to requesting clients. Compression level must be between 0 - 9.
settings_help_google_analytics: Login to your Google Analytics account and after creating your website profile copy and paste the analytics code into this field.
settings_help_app_version: Curent app version on store, use by application to check for new version
settings_error_warning: Warning: Please check the form carefully for errors!
settings_error_permission: Warning: You do not have permission to modify settings!
settings_error_name: Store Name must be between 3 and 32 characters!
settings_error_owner: Store Owner must be between 3 and 64 characters!
settings_error_address: Store Address must be between 10 and 256 characters!
settings_error_address_thai: Store Address must be between 10 and 256 characters!
settings_error_email: E-Mail Address does not appear to be valid!
settings_error_telephone: Telephone must be between 3 and 32 characters!
settings_error_meta_title: Title must be between 3 and 32 characters!
settings_error_login_attempts: Login Attempts must be greater than 0!
settings_error_customer_group_display: You must include the default customer group if you are going to use this feature!
settings_error_processing_status: You must choose at least 1 order process status
settings_error_complete_status: You must choose at least 1 order complete status
settings_error_image_thumb: Product Image Thumb Size dimensions required!
settings_error_image_popup: Product Image Popup Size dimensions required!
settings_error_image_additional: Additional Product Image Size dimensions required!
settings_error_image_related: Related Product Image Size dimensions required!
settings_error_image_wishlist: Wish List Image Size dimensions required!
settings_error_encryption: Encryption Key must be between 3 and 32 characters!
stores_help_url:
Include the full URL to your store. Make sure to add '/' at the end. Example: http://www.yourdomain.com/path/

Don't use directories to create a new store. You should always point another domain or sub domain to your hosting.
stores_help_ssl:
SSL URL to your store. Make sure to add '/' at the end. Example: http://www.yourdomain.com/path/

Don't use directories to create a new store. You should always point another domain or sub domain to your hosting.
stores_help_geocode: Please enter your store location geocode manually.
stores_help_open: Fill in your seller opening times.
stores_help_comment: This field is for any special notes you would like to tell the customer i.e. Store does not accept cheques.
stores_help_location: The different store locations you have that you want displayed on the contact us form.
stores_help_currency: Change the default currency. Clear your browser cache to see the change and reset your existing cookie.
stores_help_product_limit: Determines how many catalog items are shown per page (products, categories, etc)
stores_help_product_description_length: In the list view, short description character limit (categories, special etc)
stores_help_tax_default: Use the store address to calculate taxes if no one is logged in. You can choose to use the store address for the customers shipping or payment address.
stores_help_tax_customer: Use the customers default address when they login to calculate taxes. You can choose to use the default address for the customers shipping or payment address.
stores_help_customer_group_display: Display customer groups that new customers can select to use such as wholesale and business when signing up.
stores_help_customer_price: Only show prices when a customer is logged in.
stores_help_account: Forces people to agree to terms before an account can be created.
stores_help_checkout_guest: Allow customers to checkout without creating an account. This will not be available when a downloadable product is in the shopping cart.
stores_help_checkout: Forces people to agree to terms before an a customer can checkout.
stores_help_order_status: Set the default order status when an order is processed.
stores_help_stock_display: Display stock quantity on the product page.
stores_help_stock_checkout: Allow customers to still checkout if the products they are ordering are not in stock.
stores_help_icon: The icon should be a PNG that is 16px x 16px.
stores_help_secure: To use SSL check with your host if a SSL certificate is installed.

coupon_total_error_permission: Warning: You do not have permission to modify coupon total!

user_groups_error_permission: Warning: You do not have permission to modify user groups!

user_groups_error_user: Warning: This user group cannot be deleted as it is currently assigned to %s users!
users_error_permission: Warning: You do not have permission to modify users!
users_error_account: Warning: You can not delete your own account!

users_error_password: Password must be between 4 and 20 characters!
